flawed_nl_solution:
The total ratio representing the 500 cards is 11+9 = <<11+9=20>>20
The fraction of the total ratio that represents the number of cards that Ellis got is 11/20, and since there were 500 cards, Ellis got 11/20*500 = <<11/20*500=275>>275
If there were 500 cards, and Ellis received 275 cards, Orion received 500-275 = <<500-275=252>>252 cards
The number of cards that Ellis received more than Orion is 275-252 = <<275-252=23>>23 cards.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 225, not 252. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
